refnamediv.refpurpose: Configuration file for lwsyslogger syslog server

refsynopsisdiv.para: The /etc/lwsyslogger.conf file is the primary configuration file for the lwsyslogger syslog server.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The file format consists of sections, each of which contain configuration information in the form of keyword/value pairs. Each section begins with with the name of the section in [] brackets, followed by zero or more keyword/value pairs, with the keyword and value separated by an = sign. Lines starting with ; are ignored, as are blank lines.
refsect1.literallayout: [Section1] ; This is a comment. Keyword1=value1 Keyword2=value2 Keyword3=value3

refsect1.title: Sections/Keywords
refsect1.para: Following are the sections and keywords for lwsyslogger.conf

listitem.para: The name of the user that will own the log files generated by lwsyslogger8. This should be a "system" account, not an actual user. Default value is lwsyslogger.
The name of the group that will own the log files generated by lwsyslogger8. This should be a "system" account, not an actual user. Default value is lwsyslogger.
The root of the directory hierarchy that will contain the log files generated by lwsyslogger8. Default value is /var/log/lwsyslogger.
